titleStmt.title: In vino veritas: or, A conference betwixt Chip the cooper, and Dash the drawer (being both boozy) discovering some secrets in the wine-brewing trade. Useful for all sorts of people to save their money, and preserve their health.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for J. Nutt. near Stationers-Hall,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
